title: Today in History
tagline: A Progressive Web App using wikipedia's On This Day API to show historical events.
description: A Progressive Web App using wikipedia's API to show historical events, births and deaths which occured on the same date throughout history as when the app is accessed

title: Newsbox
tagline: Personal News webapp made using The New York Times' API
description: Webapp for News made with the basics HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Night Club
tagline: Website for a fictional Nightclub made with local API and Motion animations
description: Website for a fictional Nightclub with a focus on animations and fetching and showing data.

title: Smart Lights
tagline: IoT webapp using Philips Hue API to control a smart at home lighting setup.
description: IoT project using Philips Hue API to control a smart at home lighting setup.

title: World Weather
tagline: Webapp for weather information using OpenWeatherMap's API and React Leaflet for map integration.
description: Weather webapp using OpenWeatherMap's API to show current weather for searched locations. React Leaflet is used for map integration to show the location visually.
